title: _PEP_PPM_PLATFORM_STATE_RESIDENCIES (pep_x.h)
description: Learn how the PEP_PPM_PLATFORM_STATE_RESIDENCIES structure contains the accumulated residency times and transition counts for the idle states that are supported by the hardware platform.
